structure.unit: Chapter 8AA CABLE AND COMMUNICATIONS SERVICES PROVIDERS

text.section:
Sec. 8AA-129. Consumer protection.
Miami-Dade County may oversee compliance with all applicable consumer protection laws and regulations, including the enforcement of, Business Regulations, of the Code of Miami-Dade County and may participate in any federal, state and local proceedings involving or on behalf of consumers in Miami-Dade County. Miami-Dade County reserves the right to enact additional consumer protection provisions to the extent authorized by state and federal law.
